step.cmd: Within your board in order to create a checklist you need to either create a card or using a pre-existing card. go ahead and either create a new card or choose a pre-existing card to add a checklist to now.
Once you have done ther you can select the card you wish to add the checklist to.
After selecting the card you will see some options on the right side of the card under the "add to card" subheading, go and locate "add checklist".
Click on add checklist, now you can name the checklist and even copy items from other places within your board, if you choose to not add anything then you can click add.
Now you should see your checklist under the card you selected, you can there add new items that need to be completed using the add an item button.
Add as many items as you need for your checklist, and as you complete them you can check them off as you do.
You have now created a checklist.
